author: Fongbe Data Quality Project
description: Language pack for Fongbe (Benin) - A Gbe language spoken in Benin and Togo. This pack includes resources for analyzing French-Fongbe bilingual datasets commonly used in ASR and translation projects.
contributors: Original Fongbe Data Quality Project Team
references: Fongbe language resources for low-resource NLP
notes: This language pack uses French as a bridge language for NLP processing, as Fongbe is a low-resource language with limited NLP tools. The resources are optimized for ASR and translation quality assessment.
